channel.title: CVE Feed for Flexera Software LLC -- libexif
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Flexera Software LLC -- libexif

item.title: CVE-2018-20030|2024-09-17T01:01:49.355Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- libexif
item.description: An error when processing the EXIF_IFD_INTEROPERABILITY and EXIF_IFD_EXIF tags within libexif version 0.6.21 can be exploited to exhaust available CPU resources.
